EmailTemplate.name: BCBS Illinois EFT template
EmailTemplate.subject: BCBSIL EFT Registration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Case.Name_Submitter__c)),Case.Name_Submitter__c, Case.Account_Name_for_Email_Templates__c)}:
Your request to be included in the Blue Cross and Blue Shield (BCBSIL) provider file as a non-contracting provider has been accepted. Electronic options are preferred. To get started, you must establish a vendor connection. You will need to enlist the services of a third-party electronic business vendor, such as AvailityÂ® or your preferred vendor. If you have questions, contact us at Netops_Provider_Update@bcbsil.com.
We look forward to serving you!
Sincerely,
BCBSIL Network Operations
For Internal Purpose only. (NOTE: Please do not remove the Ref id) Ref id {!Case.EmailThread_On_Child__c}
